page.title: 13LIVING IN SOUTH BENWELL
page.content: The area is made up of a majority of {young people,}many of whom are students, who have lived in this area for less than five years. Old age {pensioners}make up the remainder of the people and many of them had spent well over fifty years in Benwell. Most of the people said that they preferred Benwell to the previous areas of Newcastle that they had lived in. Almost half of the people live in{flats}which are either multi storeyed or two storeyed early 20th. century flats. Many houses have{front gardens}but in many areas they are uncared for and abandoned. The people who owned the untidiest gardens tended to complain the most that the area was run-down.
